sentences.english: The new law also still gives rights of guardianship entirely to fathers and grandfathers.
sentences.chinese: 在新法规中父亲和爷爷依然保持着监护权。

sentences.english: If so, custody of the child would be turned over to the state Department of Social Services.
sentences.chinese: 如果判定成立，孩子的监护权将交给州社会服务处。

sentences.english: They do not have the right to exploit a parent's right of guardianship over children.
sentences.chinese: 但他们没有权利剥夺父母对孩子的监护权。

sentences.english: Is the type of custody important when it comes to the psychological well-being of the child?
sentences.chinese: 选择什么形式的监护权对孩子的心理成长重要吗？

sentences.english: My rights in respect of the child have not been limited in any way by the order of any court.
sentences.chinese: 本人对该儿童的监护权并未受任何法院颁令所限制。

sentences.english: Mothers usually only have custody while the children are young.
sentences.chinese: 母亲在子女年幼时通常只有监护权。

sentences.english: Xuan gave his ex-wife half of their property, and she got custody of their child.
sentences.chinese: 宣分给他的前妻一半财产，还把孩子的监护权给了她。

sentences.english: The Gosselins say they are working out an arrangement to share custody of their eight children.
sentences.chinese: 二人称正在制定协议来共同承担八个孩子的监护权。

sentences.english: The decision ends a five-year fight by Goldman to regain custody of his son.
sentences.chinese: 高特曼花费五年的时间，终于争取到儿子的监护权。

sentences.english: Youzhi and Youhui's custody case goes to trial.
sentences.chinese: 友志和友慧的监护权案子开审。

sentences.english: He requested joint custody and a visitation schedule with the children.
sentences.chinese: 他要求享有同样的监护权，并且能够探视孩子。

sentences.english: Let the courts decide who gets custody of kids.
sentences.chinese: 孩子的监护权归谁，让法院来判吧。

sentences.english: Under the laws of the day, Sondheim's mother retained full custody.
sentences.chinese: 据当时的法律，桑德海姆的母亲获得了完全监护权。

sentences.english: My rights in respect of the applicant have not been limited in any way by the order of any court.
sentences.chinese: 本人对申请人的监护权并未受任何法院领令所限制。

sentences.english: The mother got custody of the children.
sentences.chinese: 母亲获得了孩子的监护权。

sentences.english: But the issue of custody remained the biggest source of conflict.
sentences.chinese: 但是监护权方面的问题才是冲突的根源。

definition: to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
